title: Stocks Dip, Gold Hits Record as Tariff Woes Return: Markets Wrap
description: Risk assets slipped and haven demand strengthened after US President Donald Trump proposed new levies on eight European countries, reviving tariff-related worries across markets. The dollar fell.
content: Risk assets slipped and haven demand strengthened after US President Donald Trump proposed new levies on eight European countries, reviving tariff-related worries across markets. The dollar fell.
